nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify that
a new ERC20 token has been deployed from the ContractFactory
nodes.name: TokenDeployed

nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify that
a new Airdrop contract has been deployed from the ContractFactory
nodes.name: AirdropDeployed

nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify that
a new ICO contract has been deployed from the ContractFactory
nodes.name: ICODeployed

nodes.documentation: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token without any minting or burning functionality. *
nodes.name: deploySimpleToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have minting functionality but 
no burning functionality. *
nodes.name: deployMintableToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have burning functionality but
no minting functionality.*
nodes.name: deployBurnableToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which has both the minting and burning 
functionalities. *
nodes.name: deployMintableBurnableToken
_deployToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an airdrop contract for an ERC20 token. 
    * @param _tokenAddress - The contract address of the ERC20 token. *
nodes.name: deployAirdropContract
deployICOContract

nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify that
a new ERC20 token has been deployed from the ContractFactory
nodes.name: TokenDeployed

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:
Event is broadcast to the Ethereum blockchain to signify that
a new ICO contract has been deployed from the ContractFactory
nodes.name: ICODeployed

nodes.documentation: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token without any minting or burning functionality. *
nodes.name: deploySimpleToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have minting functionality but 
no burning functionality. *
nodes.name: deployMintableToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have burning functionality but
no minting functionality.*
nodes.name: deployBurnableToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which has both the minting and burning 
functionalities. *
nodes.name: deployMintableBurnableToken
_deployToken

nodes.documentation:
Allows users to deploy an airdrop contract for an ERC20 token. 
    * @param _tokenAddress - The contract address of the ERC20 token. *
nodes.name: deployAirdropContract
deployICOContract

params._tokenAddress: - The contract address of the ERC20 token. *

params._ethSoftCap: - The minimum amount of ETH that needs to be raised.
params._rate: - The ETH exchange rate at which the token will be sold (i.e., 1 ETH = 100 tokens)*
params._tokenAddress: - The contract address of the ERC20 token.
params._tokenDecimals: - The amount of decimals the token has.

deployAirdropContract(address).notice: Allows users to deploy an airdrop contract for an ERC20 token.

deployBurnableToken(uint256,uint8,string.notice: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have burning functionality but no minting functionality.*

deployICOContract(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Allows users to deploy an ICO contract for an ERC20 token.

deployMintableBurnableToken(uint256,uint.notice: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which has both the minting and burning  functionalities. *

deployMintableToken(uint256,uint8,string.notice: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token which does have minting functionality but  no burning functionality. *

deploySimpleToken(uint256,uint8,string,s.notice: Allows users to deploy an ERC20 token without any minting or burning functionality. *
